term: What was to problem with initial ratification?
content:
Almost all states ratified; constitution went into effect after ratification of NH, but the two largest hadn't: VA & NY
	it would make sense that they would get on board
ultimately, VA signed on with ratification

meanwhile in NY, federalists and anti-federalists were arguing in newspapers
ultimately, the anti-federalists lost the fight but they had still contributed / won
	their efforts directly led to the bill of rights
